context: Duolingo is the market leader with 88.4 million monthly active users (Q1 2024) and $748 million in revenue for 2024, the highest among language learning apps. The global language learning apps market was valued at $6.34 billion in 2024. Competition intensified with AI integration becoming standard, and the market expanded to include corporate/B2B solutions alongside consumer apps. Key differentiators include native speaker practice, AI personalization, and professional development offerings.
